seisflows3.plugins.preprocess.writers

SeisFlows uses obspy stream objects for holding and processing seismic data. In some cases, obspy.read doesn’t provide the desired behavior, so we introduce an additonal level of indirection

Used by the PREPROCESS class and specified by the WRITER parameter

Module Contents

Functions

su(st, path, filename)

Writes seismic unix files outputted by Specfem, using Obspy

ascii(st, path, filename=None)

Writes seismic traces as ascii files. Kwargs are left to keep structure of
seisflows3.plugins.preprocess.writers.su(st, path, filename)

Writes seismic unix files outputted by Specfem, using Obspy

Parameters

  • st (obspy.core.stream.Stream) – stream to write

  • path (str) – path to datasets

  • filename (str) – file to read

seisflows3.plugins.preprocess.writers.ascii(st, path, filename=None)

Writes seismic traces as ascii files. Kwargs are left to keep structure of inputs compatible with other input formats.

Parameters

  • st (obspy.core.stream.Stream) – stream to write

  • path (str) – path to datasets
